message: Cant wait to see more of your screen print poster. Its really awesome! Are you gonna sell more for the next Crafty Art Market?
Haha what craft are you coming up with at Crafty??
One of our vendors was asking if there were any posters done for the 2nd Market. Were there? I would have liked to have got myself a copy of it too.
We will be selling all 3 posters this time round.
Great! Oh, I make all-natural soap from scratch.
